title: Realization of a green-emitting pyrosilicate-structured Er3+-activated Y2Si2O7 phosphor: a systematic study of opto-electronic characteristics and thermal stability for lighting applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18716-18729
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03833A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pawan Kumar, Devender Singh, Sitender Singh, Harish Kumar, Ramesh Kumar
A series of green-emitting Y2−xSi2O7:xEr3+ phosphors (x = 1–7 mol%) have been successfully synthesized using a straightforward gel-combustion method facilitated by urea.
